description: BRA/07/013 - Programa de Desenvolvimento Sustentável da Cadeia Produtiva Madeira-Móveis na Região Amazônica Brasileira.

subproject.corporate outcome: National and local governments and communities have the capacities to adapt to climate change and make inclusive and sustainable environment & energy decisions benefitting in particular under-served populations
subproject.description:
The Project seeks to support the private and public sector, together with the institutions involved in the production chain of wood-furniture, start developing a culture of good management practices and sustainable use of forest resources, through:
 • Increased collaboration between companies and other actors involved in the production chain of value-wood furniture and other industrial products of wood;
 • Use of specific services for this productive sector, emphasizing the character of technological solutions and
 • Linking the central sector of the market trends for wood products.
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: BRA/07/013-Sus Develop Wood-Fu
